```{r pancreas 31862231, include=FALSE}

PMID_31862231 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('31862231', database = 'PubMed')

citation_31862231 <- paste0(PMID_31862231$journal,' ', PMID_31862231$year, ' ', PMID_31862231$month,';', PMID_31862231$volume,'(', PMID_31862231$number,'):', PMID_31862231$pages)

PubMed_31862231 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_31862231$eprint)

doi_31862231 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_31862231$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
